伔字的基本解释

伔
dǎn
“抌”的异体字。

伔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǎn］
［《廣韻》都感切，上感，端。］
［《廣韻》以主切，上麌，以。］
亦作“伔1”。亦作“1”。
刺，击。
[②]［yóu］
［《廣韻》以周切，平尤，以。］
亦作“伔2”。同“揄2”。
舀取。
[③]［shěn］
［《集韻》食荏切，上寑，船。］
亦作“伔3”。
系物桩。

伔字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　伔； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页96第10
【淮南子·說林訓】解捽者不在於捌格，在於批伔。【註】伔，音沉。推擊其要也。伔字从儿rén不从几。

伔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
伔字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
You
dǎn
A variant of "抌".
You
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dǎn］
["Guangyun" has a sense of touch, sense, and end. ]
["Guangyun" is based on the main cut, on the top, with. ]
Also known as "伔1". Also known as "1".
Stabbing, hitting.
[②]［yóu］
["Guangyun" cuts with Zhou, Pingyou, with. ]
Also known as "伔2". Same as "揄2".
Scoop.
[③] [shěn]
["Jiyun" cut the food, go up, and ship. ]
Also known as "Nie 3".
Tie piles.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　伔; Kangxi strokes: 6; Page number: page 96 to 10
[Huainanzi·Said Lin Xun] The solver does not lie in the pattern, but in the criticism. [Note] You, the sound is heavy. Push its essentials too. The word "cong" is not from the number of children.
